description: Out of the blue the phone rings about the third day on our trip and Christian introduces himself as 'one of the Devil Dawgs in Wes' party room' the night we picked him up for his shoot and said he'd like to give it a try. He was so anxious that he offered to let me use his hotel room to do the filming in. He said he had another buddy that was interested too and that the both of them were there and ready to do the deed. Jake and I arrive at their hotel room and Christian, Bama and Wes are there. I tell Big Jake to take the rental car and take Wes for a ride to get to know each other better (wink) while I knock out Christian and Bama's solo sessions. To my surprise the two decide not to leave the room and to chill out on the other bed while the other does his jack off session. This is extra hot to watch as both, Christian and Bama watch each other jack their cocks. I angle the camera so that we can see the other watching as the one does his deed. This is quite interesting and makes the scene that much more hot. Both boys are very comfortable beating off in front of their buddy and they joke about beating off in front of their whole platoons. Both boys shoot nice loads and we joke and laugh alot. This is a great session.(Scene 4 of 5 in 'Devil Dawg Dick.')
title: Christian
